casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. HEDENBERG
v.
N. CENT. CORR. INST. 2018-1117 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 28, 2018

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Relator's motion to strike denied as moot. O'CONNOR, C.J., and O'DONNELL, KENNEDY, FISCHER, and DEWINE, JJ., concur. FRENCH and DEGENARO, JJ., concur in the granting of respondent's motion to dismiss but would deny relator's motion to strike on the merits.
